alert.note: Alert for Grande Ronde Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 25 at 8:35PM PST until February 27 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM SATURDAY TO 10 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Grande Ronde Valley. * WHEN...From 10 AM Saturday to 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Southeast winds will be strongest through Ladd and Pyles Canyons Saturday night into Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
